list.name: Default
list.comment:
Fixed complex resource quantity calculation formula.
Reworked how the Crafting Queue quantity is adjusted.
Made EditText in NumberPicker disabled, for now. Whenever you pressed '+/-' it adjusted quantity text which triggered the EditText watcher event.
Added Primitive+ Refined Resources to Resources table.
Updated Wooden Staircase to have a drawable now.

task.summary: Default task
Updated ListAdapter names to better reflect their duties.
Dissolved createRecyclerTouchListener method into 2 separate instantiations. (Getting ready for hierarchical folders!)

Created Category table to database. Created CategoryInitializer to app.
Reworked Category to be more aware of itself. Reworked DisplayEngram, DetailEngram, InitEngram to contain a CategoryID, instead of containing an array of Categories.
Added 3 more Resources (and their relevant image resources) to database. (Up to par with in-game versions now). Added CategoryText to DetailActivity's xml. Added getCategoryDescription to Showcase, to properly display where its Engram is located (DetailActivity).

Added Category hierarchy support for displaying Engrams within their relevant Category.
Reworked DataSource to open database internally, instead of allowing external Objects control it. Reworked content_main.xml to allow for weights, for static view sizes when a large list fills DisplayCase.
Moved DisplayCase to inside DisplayCaseListAdapter, to hide its information better.
Renamed DisplayCase wrapped objects in MainActivity to better reflect their owner.
Organized methods in longer classes. Might need to break up some of these later on.

Colorized backgrounds to make it feel more like in-game. Still more to do.
Added DisplayCaseViewHolder, for strict use of DisplayCase objects.
Renamed xml layouts and their views for list items to better match their ViewHolder. Renamed all ListAdapters and LayoutManager to better reflect their owners/duties.
Reworked DataSource and DBOpenHelper to privately instantiate once over the life of Application.
Added MOST Engram recipe constants and their relative image resource. More to come!
Added MOST Engram recipe constants and their relative image resource. More to come!

Added Preferences to save persistent data. Added ability to test tables for (new) content, initialize/reset table if test failed. Added string constants to use later. Added MIN/MAX integer resource values.
Updated position of getEngramId() to be more aware of category size.
Renamed erroneous drawable resource file names.
Cleaned up some debug logging.

Updated Engrams with actual composition to test Resource ListView.
Added "Chitin or Keratin" Resource and its image.
Reworked layout designs to have a darkish blue background, trying to get an in-game feel. Still needs work.
Failed at including ProgressDialog, will come back to this. Commented for now.

Updated DisplayCase to reflect if its in Queue by applying in-game color and attaching a quantityText. Updated database queries to Order By object name.
Added more colors to match in-game design.
Cleaned up layout xml.
Added all Engrams that can be crafted to database. Will be adding saddles, dyes, etc. soon enough.
Updated drawable resource files.

Added Drugs, Dyes, Foods, Saddles (and their drawable resources) to database. Added berries, meats, and other resources to database
Renamed complex resources to reflect them as being refined.

Fixed weird bug with a cursor returning null if the SparseArray was instantiated inside its 'if getCount > 0' statement. Fixed Too Many Open Files bug, cursors weren't being closed properly. Fixed some typos.
Reworked layout files to properly fit icons and pad list elements.
Cleaned and removed some menu commands.

Added splash screen with logo to cover database loading. Added changelog screen to better display version changes. Added a way to decrease quantity easily by long clicking Crafting Queue object. Added a remove button in the detail activity, to easily remove object from Crafting Queue.
Changed default android logo to an ark logo.
Cleaned up some code, preparing for first alpha release!

Added HelpDialog to better display how to use the app. Added Creative License information to activities and main classes.
Changed how Show All and Filtered menu options will be displayed. Now they are treated like one checkable button. Changed background to appear more like in-game.
Reworked Changelog to only have changelog specific information.
Cleaned up some code, getting ready for first alpha release!!
Added Kibble engrams to database, separated into its own Initializer since it uses one image resource and one description. Added dino eggs and jerky types to ResourceInitializer.
Shrunk larger PNG files to fit 100mb limit of Google Play APKs.
Shrunk all PNG files to fit 100mb limit of Google Play APKs.

Changed package name due to Google Play infringement suspension.
Removed all image resources that weren't of the xxdpi density, save space.

Added a dialog to view current versions of app, database, and initializers. Added Fishing Rod to Weapons/Ranged.
Updated vertical banner and icon with new design. A:RC! Updated all copyright files to reflect new title, ARK:Resource Calculator
Removed Stone Development from all files.
Changed package name, again, to satisfy the Google Dev Gods.

Fixed different sized screen issue, programmatically. Will create specific layouts in future releases.
Added DisplayHelper to centralize any information needed about screen size infos.
Added back xhdpi drawables.

Reworked increasing quantities to help make the display respond quicker. It's still not as fast as I'd like, but it's tolerable. Reworked CraftingQueue object to return an instance, instead of instantiating every time it's being used.
Renamed ResourceListAdapter to CraftableResourceListAdapter, strictly used for Crafting Queue.
Added ShowcaseResourceListAdapter, strictly used for Showcase.
Optimized some code.
Fixed what I broke in last release, which helped me optimize the Crafting Queue and its objects. *WIN*
Fixed what I broke in last release, which helped me optimize the Crafting Queue and its objects. *WIN*
Cleaned up how DisplayCase asks for Quantity, should have sped up 'show all' full list display scrolling.

Added landscape mode support. Detail activity is still a little... *eh*, but it'll do for now.
Combined MainActivity's layout into a single layout, will work on doing the same for DetailActivity.
Fixed Show All showing up regardless of last setting.
Brightened in_game_background color resource.

Added support for Android OS versions down to KitKat. Added back Drawables for mdpi, hdpi.
Removed Drawables for xxhdpi.

Added support for Android OS versions down to KitKat. Added back Drawables for mdpi, hdpi.
Removed Drawables for xxhdpi.
Fixed a bug found by Google's Pre-Launch Report where HelpDialog needed to pull the compatible context for older versions.

Fixed orientation changes revert category level back to its root.
Added long preference helpers.
Cleaned up PreferenceHelper a bit.
Updated changelog to reflect latest changes, v0.1.9a!

Added 'Breakdown Resource' setting, this will breakdown Resources that are also Engrams. Added 'Complex Resource' table, even though it's not currently being used. Added 'Complex Resource' object, even though it's not currently being used. Added 'ComplexResourceInitializer' class, this is used when breaking down resources. Added 'RefinedEngramInitializer' class, helps distinguish which engrams are also resources.
Cleaned up some code thoughout.
Changed View Debug Infos to About dialog, added contact infos. Changed Show All/Filtered display to feel more like a toggle. Change Breakdown Resources menu option to feel more like a toggle.

Reworked how Engrams are shown, now full screen if crafting queue is empty.
Fixed tiny bug where the 'All [Filtered]' toggle was backwards.

Final push before next big change.
Reworked database tables and its database helper. Renamed database, reverted back to version 1. Reworked Category object, removed Level, wasn't needed.
Added a database contract. Added a database provider to communicate with contract. Added testing of new database.

Completed migration to raw JSON.
Moved Initializers to AndroidTest.
All database and provider tests pass!
Added loading screen, that works.

Added all Engrams up to Non-DLC PC Version 247.0!
Reworked DetailActivity layout.
Committing up to new version, fixed weird bug when releasing app with Minify on that dropped all drawables.

Added dimension variables for a wide variety of densities. Added custom number picker for DetailActivity.
Reworked all displays to fit properly on most screens.
Condensed duplicate code down to general ViewHolders and layouts.
BUGFIX: DisplayCase.getName() nullPointerException BUGFIX: CraftingQueue.getComplexResources() nullPointerException

Upgraded JSON to include Version attribute (Vanilla, Primitive Plus, Scorched Earth, etc)
Updated objects that communicate directly with the Version attribute.
Added an activity to help update JSON file in future.
Optimized LoadScreenActivity.
Updated categories to include Primitive+.
Updated resources to include Primitive+.
Added all/most drawables for Primitive+ DLC.
Added 'yield' attribute to Engram objects and JSON file. Added all Refined Engrams for Primitive+ to JSON file.

Fixed complex resource quantity calculation formula.
Reworked how the Crafting Queue quantity is adjusted.
Made EditText in NumberPicker disabled, for now. Whenever you pressed '+/-' it adjusted quantity text which triggered the EditText watcher event.
Added Primitive+ Refined Resources to Resources table.
Updated Wooden Staircase to have a drawable now.

MESSAGE.value:
Fixed different sized screen issue, programmatically. Will create specific layouts in future releases.
Added DisplayHelper to centralize any information needed about screen size infos.
Added back xhdpi drawables.

Reworked increasing quantities to help make the display respond quicker. It's still not as fast as I'd like, but it's tolerable. Reworked CraftingQueue object to return an instance, instead of instantiating every time it's being used.
Renamed ResourceListAdapter to CraftableResourceListAdapter, strictly used for Crafting Queue.
Added ShowcaseResourceListAdapter, strictly used for Showcase.
Optimized some code.
Fixed what I broke in last release, which helped me optimize the Crafting Queue and its objects. *WIN*
Cleaned up how DisplayCase asks for Quantity, should have sped up 'show all' full list display scrolling.

Added landscape mode support. Detail activity is still a little... *eh*, but it'll do for now.
Combined MainActivity's layout into a single layout, will work on doing the same for DetailActivity.
Fixed Show All showing up regardless of last setting.
Brightened in_game_background color resource.

Added support for Android OS versions down to KitKat. Added back Drawables for mdpi, hdpi.
Removed Drawables for xxhdpi.
Fixed a bug found by Google's Pre-Launch Report where HelpDialog needed to pull the compatible context for older versions.

Fixed orientation changes revert category level back to its root.
Added long preference helpers.
Cleaned up PreferenceHelper a bit.
Updated changelog to reflect latest changes, v0.1.9a!

Added 'Breakdown Resource' setting, this will breakdown Resources that are also Engrams. Added 'Complex Resource' table, even though it's not currently being used. Added 'Complex Resource' object, even though it's not currently being used. Added 'ComplexResourceInitializer' class, this is used when breaking down resources. Added 'RefinedEngramInitializer' class, helps distinguish which engrams are also resources.
Cleaned up some code thoughout.
Changed View Debug Infos to About dialog, added contact infos. Changed Show All/Filtered display to feel more like a toggle. Change Breakdown Resources menu option to feel more like a toggle.

Reworked how Engrams are shown, now full screen if crafting queue is empty.
Fixed tiny bug where the 'All [Filtered]' toggle was backwards.

Final push before next big change.
Reworked database tables and its database helper. Renamed database, reverted back to version 1. Reworked Category object, removed Level, wasn't needed.
Added a database contract. Added a database provider to communicate with contract. Added testing of new database.

Completed migration to raw JSON.
Moved Initializers to AndroidTest.
All database and provider tests pass!
Added loading screen, that works.

Added all Engrams up to Non-DLC PC Version 247.0!
Reworked DetailActivity layout.
Committing up to new version, fixed weird bug when releasing app with Minify on that dropped all drawables.

Added dimension variables for a wide variety of densities. Added custom number picker for DetailActivity.
Reworked all displays to fit properly on most screens.
Condensed duplicate code down to general ViewHolders and layouts.

Updated objects that communicate directly with the Version attribute.
Added an activity to help update JSON file in future.

Updated resources to include Primitive+.
Added all/most drawables for Primitive+ DLC.

Fixed complex resource quantity calculation formula.
Reworked how the Crafting Queue quantity is adjusted.
Made EditText in NumberPicker disabled, for now. Whenever you pressed '+/-' it adjusted quantity text which triggered the EditText watcher event.
Added Primitive+ Refined Resources to Resources table.
Updated Wooden Staircase to have a drawable now.
